info.title: CCI Customer Portal API
info.description: API for managing customer workspaces, shops, and Power BI reports

Gets a specific attribute unit by id
Searches attribute units by unit type

post.summary: Process impersonation token and return a valid application JWT token
Upload and process master parts from Excel/CSV file
Upload and process supplier parts from Excel/CSV file

get.summary: Get the status of a bulk upload job

Get errors for a specific bulk upload job

delete.summary: Delete a bulk upload job and its associated data

Get sample template for supplier parts

Validate an impersonation token and return info
Revoke all active impersonation tokens for a tenant

delete.summary: Remove a program assignment from a customer

delete.summary: Remove a program assignment from a shop

get.summary: Get a specific program shop subscription

get.summary: Gets a specific shop attribute by id

Searches shop attributes by name, type, or category

Get all KPIs for a specific shop attribute across all shops
Get KPIs for a specific shop by year and optionally month

Get a specific property by ID

get.summary: Get shop statistics with optional filtering

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
